Line7.102113: The priest who hired me didn't offer much more to go on. At this rate I'll freeze before I find the damn thing.
An axe. Specifically, the axe of ot: :  a man who stalked and butchered travelers in this area. Rumor has it the woodsman disappeared recently and left his weapon behind.
Line9.102113: If you help me find the axe, I'll cut you in on the pay. Check the woods around town. I'm staying here where it's safe.
